long_description:
Have you been looking for a texture pack for good swords in game for a long time? This thing for you!
Updated sword textures, convenient for pvp and most importantly... beautiful!

P.S: *Original texture pack have been maded by my friend, but he asked me to upload this texture pack.*
name: vearpons
short_description: Changes sword textures into a brand new
title: Vearpons Pack
